cast: Cast : Kemal Sunal, Münir Özkul, Halit Akçatepe, Tarik Akan
movie_description: Summary : Lazy, uneducated students share a very close bond. They live together in the dormitory, where they plan their latest pranks. When a new headmaster arrives, the students naturally try to overthrow him. A comic war of nitwits follows.

cast: Cast : Rakshit Shetty, Charlie, Sangeetha Sringeri, Raj B. Shetty
movie_description: Summary : Dharma is stuck in a rut with his negative and lonely lifestyle and spends each day in the comfort of his loneliness. A pup named Charlie enters his life and gives him a new perspective towards it.

cast: Cast : Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini, Giustino Durano
movie_description: Summary : When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

cast: Cast : Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Crispin Glover
movie_description: Summary : Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

cast: Cast : François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
movie_description: Summary : After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

cast: Cast : Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Henry Bergman, Tiny Sandford
movie_description: Summary : The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

cast: Cast : Charles Chaplin, Virginia Cherrill, Florence Lee, Harry Myers
movie_description: Summary : With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

directors: Director : Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
cast: Cast : Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali
movie_description: Summary : Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

cast: Cast : Aamir Khan, Madhavan, Mona Singh, Sharman Joshi
movie_description: Summary : Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

movie_name: Title : Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
cast: Cast : Peter Sellers, George C. Scott, Sterling Hayden, Keenan Wynn
movie_description: Summary : An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

cast: Cast : Charles Chaplin, Paulette Goddard, Jack Oakie, Reginald Gardiner
movie_description: Summary : Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney
movie_description: Summary : A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

cast: Cast : Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger, Christopher Plummer
movie_description: Summary : 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

cast: Cast : Audrey Tautou, Mathieu Kassovitz, Rufus, Lorella Cravotta
movie_description: Summary : Despite being caught in her imaginative world, Amelie, a young waitress, decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey where she finds true love.

cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Ned Beatty
movie_description: Summary : The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

cast: Cast : Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Robert Shaw, Charles Durning
movie_description: Summary : Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

cast: Cast : Gene Kelly, Donald O'Connor, Debbie Reynolds, Jean Hagen
movie_description: Summary : A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

cast: Cast : Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine, Fred MacMurray, Ray Walston
movie_description: Summary : A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

cast: Cast : Sushant Singh Rajput, Sanjana Sanghi, Sahil Vaid, Saswata Chatterjee
movie_description: Summary : The emotional journey of two hopelessly-in-love youngsters; a young girl, Kizie, who is suffering from cancer; and Manny, a boy Kizie meets at a support group.

cast: Cast : Sushant Singh Rajput, Shraddha Kapoor, Varun Sharma, Prateik Patil Babbar
movie_description: Summary : A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

movie_name: Title : The Wolf of Wall Street
cast: Cast : Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie, Matthew McConaughey
movie_description: Summary : Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

cast: Cast : Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Stephen Graham, Vinnie Jones
movie_description: Summary : Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

cast: Cast : Jim Carrey, Ed Harris, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich
movie_description: Summary : An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

cast: Cast : Viggo Mortensen, Mahershala Ali, Linda Cardellini, Sebastian Maniscalco
movie_description: Summary : A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

cast: Cast : Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe
movie_description: Summary : After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

movie_name: Title : Monty Python and the Holy Grail
cast: Cast : Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle, Terry Gilliam
movie_description: Summary : King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

cast: Cast : Marilyn Monroe, Tony Curtis, Jack Lemmon, George Raft
movie_description: Summary : After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

directors: Director : Sergio Pablos, Carlos Martínez López
cast: Cast : Jason Schwartzman, J.K. Simmons, Rashida Jones, Will Sasso
movie_description: Summary : A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

cast: Cast : Manoj Bajpayee, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tigmanshu Dhulia, Richa Chadha
movie_description: Summary : A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

cast: Cast : Charles Chaplin, Edna Purviance, Jackie Coogan, Carl Miller
movie_description: Summary : The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put their relationship in jeopardy.

movie_name: Title : To Be or Not to Be
cast: Cast : Carole Lombard, Jack Benny, Robert Stack, Felix Bressart
movie_description: Summary : During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

cast: Cast : Buster Keaton, Kathryn McGuire, Joe Keaton, Erwin Connelly
movie_description: Summary : A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

cast: Cast : Hrithik Roshan, Farhan Akhtar, Abhay Deol, Katrina Kaif
movie_description: Summary : Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

cast: Cast : Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore, Steve Buscemi
movie_description: Summary : Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

cast: Cast : Wil Wheaton, River Phoenix, Corey Feldman, Jerry O'Connell
movie_description: Summary : After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

cast: Cast : Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric, Adrien Brody
movie_description: Summary : A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

cast: Cast : Brad Garrett, Lou Romano, Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm
movie_description: Summary : A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

cast: Cast : Robin Williams, Robert Sean Leonard, Ethan Hawke, Josh Charles
movie_description: Summary : Maverick teacher John Keating returns in 1959 to the prestigious New England boys' boarding school where he was once a star student, using poetry to embolden his pupils to new heights of self-expression.

directors: Director : Pete Docter, Ronnie Del Carmen
cast: Cast : Amy Poehler, Bill Hader, Lewis Black, Mindy Kaling
movie_description: Summary : After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

directors: Director : Pete Docter, David Silverman, Lee Unkrich
cast: Cast : Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Mary Gibbs, Steve Buscemi
movie_description: Summary : In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

movie_name: Title : Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
cast: Cast : Frances McDormand, Woody Harrelson, Sam Rockwell, Caleb Landry Jones
movie_description: Summary : A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

movie_name: Title : Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
cast: Cast : Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran, Jason Statham
movie_description: Summary : Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

movie_name: Title : How to Train Your Dragon
cast: Cast : Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Craig Ferguson
movie_description: Summary : A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

cast: Cast : Hitoshi Takagi, Noriko Hidaka, Chika Sakamoto, Shigesato Itoi
movie_description: Summary : When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

cast: Cast : Darío Grandinetti, María Marull, Mónica Villa, Diego Starosta
movie_description: Summary : Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

movie_name: Title : Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
cast: Cast : James Stewart, Jean Arthur, Claude Rains, Edward Arnold
movie_description: Summary : A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his character.

cast: Cast : Eli Marienthal, Harry Connick Jr., Jennifer Aniston, Vin Diesel
movie_description: Summary : A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

cast: Cast : Paresh Rawal, Akshay Kumar, Mithun Chakraborty, Mahesh Manjrekar
movie_description: Summary : A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

cast: Cast : Ryan O'Neal, Tatum O'Neal, Madeline Kahn, John Hillerman
movie_description: Summary : During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

cast: Cast : Aamir Khan, Anushka Sharma, Sanjay Dutt, Boman Irani
movie_description: Summary : An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of there religious views on there people.
